better-player-list.settings.title: Player List Options
better-player-list.settings.header.toolt: Whether to show the header sent by the server.
better-player-list.settings.footer.toolt: Whether to show the footer sent by the server.
better-player-list.settings.key.tooltip:
When set to §lHold§r, the player list is shown only while you keep the keybind pressed.

When set to §lToggle§r, the player list switches on or off with a single press.

Your Player List keybind is currently set to %s§r.
better-player-list.settings.latency-symb: Latency is shown using the default Minecraft icons.

Latency is shown as a small number (0.5x scale) next to each player, with colors to help distinguish network quality.

Unlike §lCompact w/ Unit§r, this mode does not show the §oms§r suffix.

Latency is shown as a small number (0.5x scale) next to each player, with colors to help distinguish network quality.

The only difference from §lCompact§r is that this mode also shows the §oms§r suffix.
Latency is shown as a full-size number next to each player, with colors to help distinguish network quality. It also shows the §oms§r suffix.
better-player-list.settings.render-heads: Whether to show player heads on the player list.
By default, Minecraft does not render player heads on offline mode servers. When enabled, this setting overrides that behavior.
